alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Schuyler and southwestern Tompkins Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Reynoldsville, or 7 miles northeast of Watkins Glen, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newfield, Enfield, Burdett, Reynoldsville, Mecklenburg, Northwest Ithaca, Logan, Bennettsburg, Newfield Hamlet and Smith Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
